channel.title: Help Tabs on Piklist Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Help Tabs on Piklist Documentation

item.title: Creating Help Tabs for WordPress
item.description: Description Creating Help Tabs for WordPress is super easy with Piklist. In this example, we’ll create some help for your custom Post Type. You should already have a custom Post Type registered and working in WordPress. New to Piklist? Before you start this tutorial: Install Piklist like you would any other WordPress plugin. Decide if you are going to add the code in this tutorial to your custom plugin or your theme.
